SENT.plain: A case is reported of a newborn who presented with generalized hypotonia shortly after delivery
Muscle biopsy of the rectus femoris muscle revealed varying sized muscle fibers, displacement by fat and connective tissues, necrosis and regeneration of the muscle fibers
Magnetic resonance imaging (M.R.I.) of the brain showed normal development, compatible with the patient's age
Congenital muscular dystrophy was diagnosed from clinical manifestations, laboratory findings, and the results of muscle biopsy
